00530     // Code for dispatching events from components to event handlers.
00531 
00532     private class FormListener implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener {
00533         FormListener() {}
00534         public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
00535             if (evt.getSource() == buttonBrowseTrainingSetDirectory) {
00536                 PreferencesDialog.this.browse(evt);
00537             }
00538             else if (evt.getSource() == buttonBrowseStopWords) {
00539                 PreferencesDialog.this.browse(evt);
00540             }
00541             else if (evt.getSource() == buttonBrowseLogFile) {
00542                 PreferencesDialog.this.browse(evt);
00543             }
00544         }
00545 
00546         public void focusGained(java.awt.event.FocusEvent evt) {
00547         }
00548 
00549         public void focusLost(java.awt.event.FocusEvent evt) {
00550             if (evt.getSource() == fieldTrainingSetDirectory) {
00551                 PreferencesDialog.this.checkPath(evt);
00552             }
00553             else if (evt.getSource() == fieldStopWords) {
00554                 PreferencesDialog.this.checkPath(evt);
00555             }
00556         }
00557 
00558         public void itemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent evt) {
00559             if (evt.getSource() == checkBoxLogging) {
00560                 PreferencesDialog.this.checkBoxLoggingItemStateChanged(evt);
00561             }
00562         }
00563 
00564         public void stateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {
00565             if (evt.getSource() == checkBoxStopWords) {
00566                 PreferencesDialog.this.checkBoxStopWordsStateChanged(evt);
00567             }
00568             else if (evt.getSource() == checkBoxStemming) {
00569                 PreferencesDialog.this.checkBoxStemmingStateChanged(evt);
00570             }
00571             else if (evt.getSource() == sliderKFold) {
00572                 PreferencesDialog.this.fixKFold(evt);
00573             }
00574             else if (evt.getSource() == checkBoxStratified) {
00575                 PreferencesDialog.this.fixKFold(evt);
00576             }
00577         }
00578     }// </editor-fold>//GEN-END:initComponents
00579     
00589     private void updatePreference(String preferenceName, String defaultValue, String updatedValue) {
00590         
00591         if (!preferences.get(preferenceName, defaultValue).equals(updatedValue)) {
00592             preferences.put(preferenceName, updatedValue);
00593         }
00594     }
00595     
00600     @Action
00601     public void cancel() {
00602         dispose();
00603     }
00604     
00615     private void initializeInterface(boolean reset) {
00616         try {
00620             FocusListener[] focusListenersTrainingSet = fieldTrainingSetDirectory.getFocusListeners();
00621             for (FocusListener FL : focusListenersTrainingSet) {
00622                 fieldTrainingSetDirectory.removeFocusListener(FL);
00623             }
00624 
00625             FocusListener[] focusListenersStopWords = fieldStopWords.getFocusListeners();
00626             for (FocusListener FL : focusListenersStopWords) {
00627                 fieldStopWords.removeFocusListener(FL);
00628             }
00629             
00634             //The path of the training set's directory
00635             trainingSetDirectory = application.getTrainingSetDirectory(reset);
00636             fieldTrainingSetDirectory.setText(trainingSetDirectory);
00637             
00638             //The current scraper
00639             String scraperName = application.getScraper(reset).getClass().getName();
00640             List<Class> scrapers = DocumentClassifierApp.getClassesForPackage(application.getScrapersPackageName());
00641             if (scrapers.isEmpty()) {
00642                 throw new Exception(preferencesDialogResources.getString("messages.noScraperFound"));
00643             }
00644             String currentScraperName;
00645             for (Class currentScraper : scrapers) {
00646                 currentScraperName = currentScraper.getName();
00647                 if (!currentScraperName.endsWith(".Scraper")) {
00648                     Class scraperClass = Class.forName(currentScraperName);
00649                     Object scraperInstance = scraperClass.newInstance();
00650                     comboBoxScraper.addItem(scraperInstance);
00651                     if (scraperInstance.getClass().getName().equals(scraperName)) {
00652                         comboBoxScraper.setSelectedItem(scraperInstance);
00653                     }
00654                 }
00655             }
00656             
00657             //If removal of stopwords from documents is enabled or not.
00658             checkBoxStopWords.setSelected(application.isRemovalStopWords(reset));
00659             fieldStopWords.setEnabled(checkBoxStopWords.isSelected());
00660 
00661             //The path of the file with the list of stopwords.
00662             stopWordsList = application.getStopWordsList(reset);
00663             fieldStopWords.setText(stopWordsList);
00664 
00665             //If stemming of documents' terms is enabled or not.
00666             checkBoxStemming.setSelected(application.isStemming(reset));
00667             comboBoxStemmers.setEnabled(checkBoxStemming.isSelected());
00668 
00669             //The current stemmer.
00670             String stemmerName = application.getStemmer(reset);
00671             List<Class> stemmers = DocumentClassifierApp.getClassesForPackage(application.getStemmersPackageName());
00672             if (stemmers.isEmpty() && checkBoxStemming.isSelected()) {
00673                 throw new Exception(preferencesDialogResources.getString("messages.noStemmerFound"));
00674             }
00675             String currentStemmerName, currentTrimmedStemmerName;
00676             for (Class currentStemmer : stemmers) {
00677                 currentStemmerName = currentStemmer.getName();
00678                 currentTrimmedStemmerName = currentStemmerName.substring(currentStemmerName.indexOf("ext.") + 4);
00679                 comboBoxStemmers.addItem(currentTrimmedStemmerName);
00680                 if (currentStemmerName.equals(stemmerName)) {
00681                     comboBoxStemmers.setSelectedItem(currentTrimmedStemmerName);
00682                 }
00683             }
00684             
00685             //The current metric.
00686             if (application.getMetric(reset).equals("TF-IDF")) {
00687                 buttonTFIDF.setSelected(true);
00688             } else {
00689                 buttonBhattacharrya.setSelected(true);
00690             }
00691 
00692             //The value of K for the K-NN.
00693             sliderKNN.setValue(application.getKNN(reset));
00694             
00695             //The maximum value of K for the K-NN, during K-Fold cross validation.
00696             sliderKNNMaximum.setValue(application.getMaximumKNNValidation(reset));
00697             
00698             //The value of K for the K-Fold cross validation.
00699             sliderKFold.setValue(application.getKFold(reset));
00700             
00701             //If partitioning for the K-Fold cross validation must be stratified or not.
00702             checkBoxStratified.setSelected(application.isStratified(reset));
00703             
00704             //If logging during the validation phase is enabled or not.
00705             checkBoxLogging.setSelected(application.isLogging(reset));
00706             
00707             //The path of the log file.
00708             logFile=application.getLogFile(reset);
00709             fieldLogFile.setText(logFile);
00710             
00711             //If the log file must be overwritten each time it is opened.
00712             checkBoxOverwriteLogFile.setSelected(application.isOverwriteLogFile(reset));
00713             
00714             //If the current document must be visualized during the validation phase.
00715             checkBoxVisualizeCurrentDocument.setSelected(application.isVisualizeCurrentDocument(reset));
00716             
00717             //If the list of document of the training set, ranked to the query, must be visualized or not during the validation phase.
00718             checkBoxVisualizeListDocuments.setSelected(application.isVisualizeListRankedDocuments(reset));
00719             
00723             for (FocusListener FL : focusListenersStopWords) {
00724                 fieldStopWords.addFocusListener(FL);
00725             }
00726 
00727             for (FocusListener FL : focusListenersTrainingSet) {
00728                 fieldTrainingSetDirectory.addFocusListener(FL);
00729             }
00730 
00731         } catch (Exception ex) {
00732             DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00733         }
00734     }
00735     
00741     @Action
00742     public void OK() {
00743         
00744         String currentKey;
00745         
00746         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.SCRAPER;
00747         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), comboBoxScraper.getSelectedItem().getClass().getName());
00748         
00749         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isREMOVALSTOPWORDS;
00750         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxStopWords.isSelected()));
00751         
00752         if (checkBoxStopWords.isSelected()) {
00753             checkPath(new FocusEvent(fieldStopWords, FocusEvent.FOCUS_LOST));
00754         }
00755         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.STOPWORDSLIST;
00756         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), fieldStopWords.getText());
00757         
00758         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isSTEMMING;
00759         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxStemming.isSelected()));
00760         
00761         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.STEMMER;
00762         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), application.getStemmersPackageName() + "." + ((String) comboBoxStemmers.getSelectedItem()));
00763         
00764         checkPath(new FocusEvent(fieldTrainingSetDirectory, FocusEvent.FOCUS_LOST));
00765         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.TRAININGSETDIRECTORY;
00766         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), fieldTrainingSetDirectory.getText());
00767         
00768         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.METRIC;
00769         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), (buttonTFIDF.isSelected()) ? "TF-IDF" : "Bhattacharrya");
00770         
00771         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.KNN;
00772         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(sliderKNN.getValue()));
00773         
00774         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.MAXKNNVALIDATION;
00775         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(sliderKNNMaximum.getValue()));
00776         
00777         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.KFOLD;
00778         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(sliderKFold.getValue()));
00779         
00780         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isSTRATIFIED;
00781         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxStratified.isSelected()));
00782         
00783         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isLOGGING;
00784         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxLogging.isSelected()));
00785         
00786         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.LOGFILE;
00787         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(fieldLogFile.getText()));
00788         
00789         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isOVERWRITELOGFILE;
00790         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxOverwriteLogFile.isSelected()));
00791         
00792         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isVISUALIZECURRENTDOCUMENT;
00793         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxVisualizeCurrentDocument.isSelected()));
00794         
00795         currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isVISUALIZELISTRANKEDDOCUMENTS;
00796         updatePreference(currentKey, mapPreferences.get(currentKey), String.valueOf(checkBoxVisualizeListDocuments.isSelected()));
00797         
00798         //Once the new values of the modified preferences have been saved, the JDialog is closed.
00799         dispose();
00800     }
00801 
00805     @Action
00806     public void reset() {
00807         initializeInterface(true);
00808     }
00809     
00816 private void browse(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_browse
00817     try {
00818         JFileChooser fileChooser = new JFileChooser();
00819         Object source=evt.getSource();
00820         boolean isTrainingSet = source.equals(buttonBrowseTrainingSetDirectory);
00821         boolean isStopwordsList=source.equals(buttonBrowseStopWords);
00822         if (isTrainingSet) {
00823             fileChooser.setFileSelectionMode(JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY);
00824             fileChooser.setCurrentDirectory(new File(trainingSetDirectory).getParentFile());
00825         } else if (isStopwordsList) {
00826             fileChooser.setFileSelectionMode(JFileChooser.FILES_ONLY);
00827             fileChooser.setCurrentDirectory(new File(stopWordsList).getParentFile());
00828             fileChooser.removeChoosableFileFilter(fileChooser.getAcceptAllFileFilter());
00829             fileChooser.setFileFilter(new FileFilter() {
00830 
00831                 @Override
00832                 public boolean accept(File arg) {
00833                     if (arg.getName().toLowerCase().endsWith(".txt") || arg.isDirectory()) {
00834                         return true;
00835                     } else {
00836                         return false;
00837                     }
00838                 }
00839 
00840                 @Override
00841                 public String getDescription() {
00842                     return preferencesDialogResources.getString("JFileChooser.textFileType");
00843                 }
00844             });
00845         } else {
00846             fileChooser.setFileSelectionMode(JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY);
00847             fileChooser.setCurrentDirectory((new File(logFile).getParentFile()));
00848         }
00849         if (fileChooser.showOpenDialog(this) == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
00850             String newPath = fileChooser.getSelectedFile().getCanonicalPath();
00851             if (isTrainingSet && application.generateTrainingSet(newPath)) {
00852                 fieldTrainingSetDirectory.setText(newPath);
00853                 checkPath(new FocusEvent(fieldTrainingSetDirectory, FocusEvent.FOCUS_LOST));
00854             } else if (isStopwordsList) {
00855                 fieldStopWords.setText(newPath);
00856                 checkPath(new FocusEvent(fieldStopWords, FocusEvent.FOCUS_LOST));
00857             } else {
00858                 fieldLogFile.setText(newPath);
00859             }
00860         }
00861     } catch (Exception ex) {
00862         DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00863     }
00864 }//GEN-LAST:event_browse
00865 
00866 private void checkBoxStemmingStateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_checkBoxStemmingStateChanged
00867     comboBoxStemmers.setEnabled(checkBoxStemming.isSelected());
00868 }//GEN-LAST:event_checkBoxStemmingStateChanged
00869 
00870 private void checkBoxStopWordsStateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_checkBoxStopWordsStateChanged
00871     fieldStopWords.setEnabled(checkBoxStopWords.isSelected());
00872 }//GEN-LAST:event_checkBoxStopWordsStateChanged
00873 
00883 private void checkPath(java.awt.event.FocusEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_checkPath
00884 
00885     JTextField referenceField = (JTextField) evt.getSource();
00886     String oldPath;
00887     boolean isTrainingSet = (referenceField == fieldTrainingSetDirectory);
00888     if (isTrainingSet) {
00889         oldPath = trainingSetDirectory;
00890     } else {
00891         oldPath = stopWordsList;
00892     }
00893     String newPath = referenceField.getText();
00894     if (!newPath.equals(oldPath)) {
00895         try {
00896             if (isTrainingSet) {
00897                 //Check of the training set directory
00898                 if (application.generateTrainingSet(newPath)) {
00899                     trainingSetDirectory = newPath;
00900                     sliderKNN.setMaximum(application.getKNNMaximum());
00901                     sliderKNNMaximum.setMaximum(sliderKNN.getMaximum());
00902                     sliderKFold.setMaximum(application.getKFoldMaximum());
00903                 } else {
00904                     DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(preferencesDialogResources.getString("messages.invalidTrainingSet"));
00905                     referenceField.setText(oldPath);
00906                 }
00907             } else {
00908                 //Check of the file with the list of stopwords
00909                 if (new File(newPath).isFile()) {
00910                     stopWordsList = newPath;
00911                 } else {
00912                     DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(preferencesDialogResources.getString("messages.invalidStopWords"));
00913                     referenceField.setText(oldPath);
00914                     if(!(new File(oldPath).isFile())) {
00915                         checkBoxStopWords.setEnabled(false);
00916                     }
00917                 }
00918             }
00919         } catch (Exception ex) {
00920             DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00925             referenceField.setText(oldPath);
00926         }
00927     }
00928 }//GEN-LAST:event_checkPath
00929 
00948 private void fixKFold(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_fixKFold
00949     
00950     int currentKFold = sliderKFold.getValue();
00951     int trainingSetSize=application.getTrainingSetSize();
00952     if (checkBoxStratified.isSelected()) {
00953         final int numberCategories = application.getTrainingSet().size();
00954         Map<Integer, Integer> possibleKFolds = new HashMap<Integer, Integer>();
00955         Entry<Integer, Integer> minimumDistance = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Integer,Integer>(0, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
00956         int i = 1;
00957         int possibleKFold, currentDistance;
00958         possibleKFold = trainingSetSize / (numberCategories * i);
00959         sliderKFold.setMaximum(possibleKFold);
00960         while (possibleKFold > sliderKFold.getMinimum()) {
00961             if (!possibleKFolds.containsKey(possibleKFold)) {
00962                 currentDistance = Math.abs(possibleKFold - currentKFold);
00963                 possibleKFolds.put(possibleKFold, currentDistance);
00964                 if (currentDistance < minimumDistance.getValue()) {
00965                     minimumDistance = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Integer,Integer>(possibleKFold, currentDistance);
00966                 }
00967             }
00968             i++;
00969             possibleKFold = trainingSetSize / (numberCategories * i);
00970         }
00971         int newKFold=minimumDistance.getKey();
00972         sliderKFold.setValue(newKFold);
00973         sliderKNNMaximum.setMaximum((trainingSetSize/newKFold/numberCategories)*numberCategories*(currentKFold-1));
00974     } else {
00975         sliderKFold.setMaximum(application.getKFoldMaximum());
00976         sliderKNNMaximum.setMaximum((trainingSetSize/currentKFold)*(currentKFold-1));
00977     }
00978 }//GEN-LAST:event_fixKFold
00979 
00980 private void checkBoxLoggingItemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_checkBoxLoggingItemStateChanged
00981 
00982     boolean isLoggingEnabled=checkBoxLogging.isSelected();
00983     fieldLogFile.setEnabled(isLoggingEnabled);
00984     checkBoxOverwriteLogFile.setEnabled(isLoggingEnabled);
00985 }//GEN-LAST:event_checkBoxLoggingItemStateChanged
